title: Asteroids, comets and meteorites
creator_credit: Herbert Schick and Film Associates of California
brief_description: This film opens with pictures of man-made satellites and proceeds to show the characteristics of the minor members of the solar system - asteroids, comets and meteorites. Animated diagrams show the ways meteorites, comets and asteroids move in the system. Suitable for lower secondary level.
